sentences.en: All - consuming, competitive spirit meets rampant insecurity.
sentences.cn: 你很有斗争, 开拓精神,但确很缺乏安全感.

sentences.en: Beneath his smart, generous, unflappable exterior lurks massive insecurity.
sentences.cn: 他聪明大度 、 从容镇定的外表下实则潜藏着严重的危机感.

sentences.en: Conceit,in many cases, describes a state of serious emotional insecurity.
sentences.cn: 在许多情况下，自负表示一种严重的情绪上的惶惶不安的心理状态。

sentences.en: Do large families make economic sense in an environment of widespread poverty and financial insecurity?
sentences.cn: 在普遍贫困、收入无保障的环境里,大家庭有无经济上的意义?

sentences.en: He, moreover, was convinced that my special talents would flourish best under conditions of personal insecurity.
sentences.cn: 他还认为, 只有在我个人感到不安全的情况下,才能充分发挥我的才干.

sentences.en: I knew only too well the nearly frantic insecurity felt by him after every public performance.
sentences.cn: 我非常清楚,他在每次公开亮相后那种近乎狂乱的不安全感.
可能会不知不觉地产生不安全感。

sentences.en: Israel's insecurity was so pervasive that even words were daggers.
sentences.cn: 以色列感到到处都有危险,甚至纸面上的文字也是刀枪林立.

sentences.en: It'seems to be rooted in confidence rather than insecurity.
sentences.cn: 它来源于信心而不是出于不稳定感.

sentences.en: Many believe it was his shyness and insecurity which let him down.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为是他的腼腆和缺乏安全感拖了他的后腿。

sentences.en: Poverty and insecurity are two of the greatest threats to “harmony” – a word at the core of the WHO Constitution, but one we rarely hear today.
sentences.cn: 贫困和不安全是对“和谐”一词的两个最大威胁，这个词是《世界卫生组织组织法》的核心词，但是我们今天已很少听到。

sentences.en: She felt the insecurity of her tenure of her brother's hospitality.
sentences.cn: 她感到,她在她弟弟府上的居留权已朝不保夕.

sentences.en: She is assailed by self-doubt and emotional insecurity.
sentences.cn: 她被自我怀疑和情感上的不安全感所困扰。

sentences.en: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.cn: 这种冒险事业的不安全性使投资者望而却步.

sentences.en: The very insecurity that engenders the suspicion discounts the value of the assurance.
sentences.cn: 产生怀疑的不安全感本身就要给这种保证打折扣.

sentences.en: There's more than meets the eye here - power struggles often stem from insecurity.
sentences.cn: 不光是眼前这些事 —— 力量的角逐经常来源于不安全感.

sentences.en: This insecurity is infuriating and the antithesis of considerate human behavior.
sentences.cn: 这种不安全感简直令人生气,它完全违背了人类的体贴.

words.tran_cn: 不安全的；不稳定的；不牢靠的
不安全；不牢靠；无把握；心神不定

trans.tran_cn: 不安全，不牢靠，局促不安，无把握
